metadata.dc:author: Ortiz Hurtado, H
Rodríguez Garrido, J
Montes Díaz, M
De Miguel Velasco, M
Pérez Cabañas, I
metadata.dc:description: A patient with a jejunal leiomyoblastoma presented with lower gastrointestinal haemorrhage, a most unusual occurrence according to the literature. The provisional diagnosis was made by arteriography and confirmed pathologically. The characteristics of these tumours are analyzed and the management discussed.
metadata.dc:title: Hemorragia digestiva baja por leiomioblastoma de yeyuno.
[Lower gastrointestinal hemorrhage caused by jejunal leiomyoblastoma].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
